title: Codevolution
description: Tutorials on the latest tech in web development! Structured and comprehensive videos with examples and therotical aspects in detail. Crisp and clear explanations of more complex topics like React Hooks.

description: Master React and Redux Toolkit. Includes RTK Query, tons of custom hooks, and more! Create dynamic web apps using the latest in web technology

description: We'll cover all the basics - what React is, setting up, components & routing - before diving into state management, async code, built-in hooks & custom hooks too.

title: Thapa Technical
